original_text: while I bring a morsel of bread, that you may refresh yourselves, and after that you may pass on—since you have come to your servant.” So they said, “Do as you have said.”
korean_text: 내가 떡을 조금 가져오리니 당신들의 마음을 상쾌하게 하신 후에 지나가소서 당신들이 종에게 오셨음이니이다 그들이 이르되 네 말대로 그리하라

sentences.original_text: while I bring a morsel of bread,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 떡 한 조각을 가져오는 동안,

sentences.original_text: and after that you may pass on—
since you have come to your servant.”
